00033 #include <iostream>
00034 
00035 #include "RAS_GLExtensionManager.h"
00036 
00037 namespace bgl
00038 {
00039     void InitExtensions(bool debug)
00040     {
00041         static bool firsttime = true;
00042         
00043         if (firsttime) {
00044             firsttime = false;
00045 
00046             if (debug) {
00047                 if (GLEW_ATI_pn_triangles)
00048                     std::cout << "Enabled GL_ATI_pn_triangles" << std::endl;
00049                 if (GLEW_ARB_texture_env_combine)
00050                     std::cout << "Detected GL_ARB_texture_env_combine" << std::endl;
00051                 if (GLEW_ARB_texture_cube_map)
00052                     std::cout << "Detected GL_ARB_texture_cube_map" << std::endl;
00053                 if (GLEW_ARB_multitexture)
00054                     std::cout << "Detected GL_ARB_multitexture" << std::endl;
00055                 if (GLEW_ARB_shader_objects)
00056                     std::cout << "Detected GL_ARB_shader_objects" << std::endl;
00057                 if (GLEW_ARB_vertex_shader)
00058                     std::cout << "Detected GL_ARB_vertex_shader" << std::endl;
00059                 if (GLEW_ARB_fragment_shader)
00060                     std::cout << "Detected GL_ARB_fragment_shader" << std::endl;
00061                 if (GLEW_ARB_vertex_program)
00062                     std::cout << "Detected GL_ARB_vertex_program" << std::endl;
00063                 if (GLEW_ARB_depth_texture)
00064                     std::cout << "Detected GL_ARB_depth_texture" << std::endl;
00065                 if (GLEW_EXT_separate_specular_color)
00066                     std::cout << "Detected GL_EXT_separate_specular_color" << std::endl;
00067             }
00068         }
00069     }
00070 } // namespace bgl
